oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1925 correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: correspondence; Wright, Frances; 1920s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Kenneth Sylvan Guthrie [grandson of Frances Wright], N. Yonkers, NY, to My Dear Miss Banks. Encourages her in effort to write biography of Frances Wright. His material is in New Harmony library; his brother has mss. and family documents.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Guthrie, Kenneth Sylvan
